comments.text: This API is not tested at all.  We need to test it for general correctness, and specifically test for the fix in bug 635546 (both to make sure that ReadStringValue returns the expanded version of the string for REG_EXPAND_SZ values, and that it returns the string with the correct length).
comments.raw_text: This API is not tested at all.
